Package org.opentcs.algorithms

Interfaces for pluggable algorithms and strategies.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DeadlockPredictor
    A DeadlockPredictor manages resources used by vehicles, preventing deadlocks.
    Dispatcher
    This interface declares the methods a dispatcher module for the openTCS kernel must implement.
    KernelExtension
    Declares the methods that a generic kernel extension must implement.
    ParkingStrategy
    A strategy for finding parking positions for vehicles.
    RechargeStrategy
    A strategy for finding locations suitable for recharging vehicles.
    RecoveryEvaluator
    Objects implementing this interface may evaluate the kernel's recovery status.
    ResourceUser
    Defines callback methods for clients of the resource scheduler.
    Router
    This interface declares the methods a router module for the openTCS kernel must implement.
    Scheduler
    A Scheduler manages resources used by vehicles, preventing both collisions and deadlocks.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ResourceAllocationException
    Thrown when allocating resources for a ResourceUser is impossible.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    KernelExtension.Modelling
    Annotation type for marking/binding injectable extensions for modelling mode.
    KernelExtension.Operating
    Annotation type for marking/binding injectable extensions for operating mode.
    KernelExtension.Permanent
    Annotation type for marking/binding injectable extensions for all modes.

Package org.opentcs.algorithms Description

Interfaces for pluggable algorithms and strategies.
